title: Four-Legged Friends Now Welcome At The Cornhusker, A Marriott Hotel In Lincoln, Nebraska
text:
The Cornhusker, A Marriott Hotel
Hotel in Lincoln sets aside five rooms to allow guests to bring up to two dogs totaling 50 pounds for a $75 deposit
LINCOLN, Neb. , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Every dog has its day! That's the new motto of The Cornhusker, A Marriott Hotel , which has recently decided to relax its pet policy so travelers can sit and stay right beside their favorite furry friends.
The hotel in Downtown Lincoln, Nebraska has implemented a new policy allowing guests to skip the hassle of boarding their dogs or hiring a sitter. Instead, for a simple $75 nonrefundable deposit, visitors can lodge with up to two dogs totaling 50 pounds. Five rooms are available and designated as pet-friendly.
Upon check-in, travelers will receive a special pet package featuring welcome treats, food bowls and a dog bed, ensuring four-legged guests feel just as welcome as their human companions.
When it's time to let Fido or Fluffy out, visitors can take advantage of grassy areas surrounding the hotel or head to Rickman's Run Dog Park about 5.5 miles away from The Cornhusker. The plot of land across from Holmes Lake Park features plenty of space for pets to run and frolic.
Guests can head to the nearby Petco to pick up dog food or toys (souvenirs), or treat their pet to a special shampoo and grooming session at Bailey's Best Friends , less than 2 miles away. In the event of a pet emergency, visitors can rest easy knowing Jacobson Veterinary Clinic is just 2.6 miles from the hotel. For an after-hours emergency, the Veterinary Emergency Services of Lincoln is also a short 3 miles away and open all day Sunday.
The pet-friendly Lincoln hotel sports stylishly appointed accommodations with plenty of space for humans to get comfortable in, too. While pups snooze in their cozy beds, visitors can catch some ZZZs on cotton-rich sheets, plush down comforters and plenty of soft pillows. Catch up on business at large work desks with ergonomic chairs, and stay well-connected with high-speed Internet access. Humans can even order room service from the hotel's Miller Time Pub & Grill while enjoying their favorite TV show or pay-per-view movie. Mini refrigerators, complimentary bottled water, coffee makers and Thaan products are among the many additional amenities travelers won't bark about while visiting for business or leisure.
About The Cornhusker, A Marriott Hotel
The Cornhusker, A Marriott Hotel is at 333 S. 13th St. in Lincoln, NE in the heart of Downtown Lincoln and just minutes from the historic Haymarket District. The hotel, which has proudly served Nebraska's capital city for almost 90 years, offers 300 guest rooms within easy walking distance of the University of Nebraska , Memorial Stadium, the State Capitol, Railyard and Pinnacle Bank Arena. Take advantage of newly renovated amenities including 46,000 square feet of flexible meeting space and complimentary Wi-Fi in all public spaces, or grab a perfectly paired bite and brew at Miller Time Pub & Grill. Take a dip in the heated indoor pool, and hit the well-equipped gym and more. For information, visit www.marriott.com/LNKFS or call 1-402-474-7474.
